column4: is not a good idea to mix debian and ubuntu packages (and the debian package doesn't contain the info pages either (at least the ones in debian unstable)).
the stable grep package contains the info pages

they're not so different, ubuntu is based on debian, so their basic structures are almost identical, and besides, it's not a problem to install most debian packages in ubuntu, unless they're important packages, and the packages you're installing are some kinda early version or something
